item.title: By: walter higgins

item.description: Yay ! just what we need - more mindless web2.0 cheerleading and bandwagoneering.
item.content:encoded: Yay ! just what we need – more mindless web2.0 cheerleading and bandwagoneering.

item.title: By: EirePreneur
item.dc:creator: EirePreneur
item.description:
<strong>Web 2.0 in Ireland (and San Francisco)</strong>
Fergus Burns of Sligo based Nooked reports from San Francisco where he`s attending the Web2.0 conference with other businesses from the Irish north-west. Interestingly they have created a new blog - called Web 2.0 in Ireland - which is sponsored
item.content:encoded:
Web 2.0 in Ireland (and San Francisco)

Fergus Burns of Sligo based Nooked reports from San Francisco where he`s attending the Web2.0 conference with other businesses from the Irish north-west. Interestingly they have created a new blog – called Web 2.0 in Ireland – which is sponsored
